statements: SELECT * FROM legislative_bills;
SELECT bill_name, introduced_date FROM legislative_bills;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE passed_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT bill_id, bill_name FROM legislative_bills ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE introduced_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE bill_id = 1;
SELECT bill_name, passed_date FROM legislative_bills WHERE introduced_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bill_id, bill_name FROM legislative_bills ORDER BY bill_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_bills WHERE bill_name LIKE '%tax%';
SELECT MAX(passed_date) AS latest_passed_date FROM legislative_bills;
SELECT * FROM introduced_bills;
SELECT bill_id, bill_name FROM introduced_bills ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT bill_name FROM introduced_bills WHERE introduction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM passed_bills WHERE passed_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT bill_name, passed_date FROM passed_bills ORDER BY passed_date;
SELECT * FROM introduced_bills WHERE introduction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT bill_name, introduction_date FROM introduced_bills ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM passed_bills WHERE passed_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT bill_name, passed_date FROM passed_bills ORDER BY passed_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM introduced_bills JOIN passed_bills ON introduced_bills.bill_id = passed_bills.bill_id;
SELECT * FROM Bills;
SELECT bill_number, introduced_date FROM Bills ORDER BY introduced_date DESC;
SELECT name, party FROM Legislators WHERE party='Democratic';
SELECT action, action_date FROM BillHistory WHERE action='Introduced';
SELECT * FROM Bills JOIN BillHistory ON Bills.bill_id = BillHistory.bill_id;

SELECT Bills.bill_id, Bills.bill_number, Legislators.name AS legislator_name, Bills.introduced_date FROM Bills JOIN Legislators ON Bills.bill_id = Legislators.legislator_id ORDER BY Bills.introduced_date DESC;

SELECT Bills.bill_id, Bills.bill_number, BillHistory.action, BillHistory.action_date FROM Bills JOIN BillHistory ON Bills.bill_id = BillHistory.bill_id ORDER BY Bills.bill_number ASC, BillHistory.action_date DESC;

SELECT Bills.bill_number, Legislators.party, BillHistory.action, BillHistory.action_date FROM Bills JOIN Legislators ON Bills.bill_id = Legislators.legislator_id JOIN BillHistory ON Bills.bill_id = BillHistory.bill_id WHERE BillHistory.action = 'Passed' ORDER BY Bills.bill_number ASC, BillHistory.action_date DESC;

SELECT Bills.bill_number, Legislators.name AS legislator_name, Legislators.party, Bills.introduced_date FROM Bills JOIN Legislators ON Bills.bill_id = Legislators.legislator_id WHERE Legislators.party = 'Republican' ORDER BY Bills.introduced_date DESC;

SELECT Bills.bill_number, COUNT(BillHistory.history_id) AS num_actions FROM Bills JOIN BillHistory ON Bills.bill_id = BillHistory.bill_id GROUP BY Bills.bill_id HAVING num_actions > 2 ORDER BY num_actions DESC, Bills.bill_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM bills;
SELECT bill_name, introduced_date, passed_date FROM bills;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE legislator_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sponsors WHERE bill_id = 5;
SELECT sponsor_id, bill_id, legislator_id FROM sponsors WHERE legislator_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM legislators;
SELECT bill_name, introduced_date, passed_date FROM bills WHERE passed_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT legislator_name, vote_type, vote_date FROM legislators, votes WHERE legislators.legislator_id = votes.legislator_id;
SELECT bill_name, legislator_name FROM bills, sponsors, legislators WHERE bills.bill_id = sponsors.bill_id AND legislators.legislator_id = sponsors.legislator_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bills FROM bills;
SELECT * FROM bills;
SELECT bill_name, introduced_date, passed_date FROM bills;
SELECT * FROM bill_sponsors WHERE sponsor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT sponsor_name, b.bill_name FROM bill_sponsors bs INNER JOIN bills b ON bs.bill_id = b.bill_id;
SELECT legislator_name, party_affiliation FROM legislators WHERE district_number = 5;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE introduced_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT bill_name, passed_date FROM bills ORDER BY passed_date DESC;

SELECT b.bill_name, bs.sponsor_name, bh.event_description FROM bills b JOIN bill_sponsors bs ON b.bill_id = bs.bill_id JOIN bill_history bh ON b.bill_id = bh.bill_id WHERE bs.sponsor_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT b.bill_name, bv.vote_type, l.legislator_name FROM bills b JOIN bill_votes bv ON b.bill_id = bv.bill_id JOIN legislators l ON bv.voter_name = l.legislator_name WHERE l.party_affiliation = 'Republican';

SELECT b.bill_name, bs.sponsor_name, bh.event_description, l.party_affiliation FROM bills b JOIN bill_sponsors bs ON b.bill_id = bs.bill_id JOIN bill_history bh ON b.bill_id = bh.bill_id JOIN legislators l ON l.legislator_name = bh.event_description WHERE bh.event_date > '2022-01-01';
